# HotelPhotoDto

Photos specific information of the hotel.

**Properties**

| Name         | Type | Required | Description                                    |
| :----------- | :--- | :------- | :--------------------------------------------- |
| main_photo   | bool | ❌       | Is this the main hotel photo.                  |
| url_original | str  | ❌       | Url of the photo with max width of 500 pixels. |
